text: Denis Umbertovich Valdez Perez (; born 26 February 1979 in Moscow) is a former Russian football player. His father is from Spain and his mother is from Russia. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Russian people of Spanish descent Category:Footballers from Moscow Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Elista players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Khimik-Arsenal players Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Denis Valdez Perez
